comments.author: o_e_l_e_o
comments.body: Yeah, we are going to need more information than that.What software did you use to generate the wallet?What are you trying to restore from? Do you have a seed phrase of 12-24 words? Do you have an electronic wallet file? Do you have a raw private key?What have you tried so far that hasn't worked?

comments.body: Quote from: o_e_l_e_o on January 09, 2023, 01:11:34 PMYeah, we are going to need more information than that.What software did you use to generate the wallet?What are you trying to restore from? Do you have a seed phrase of 12-24 words? Do you have an electronic wallet file? Do you have a raw private key?What have you tried so far that hasn't worked?Since OP has edited the post, I just did a quick search on ninjastic.space for the archieved version[1] of this thread. He wants to restore his wallet through master private key in bitcoin core. But Im unsure if bitcoin core has such facility yet. Btw, @nikok, why did you edit the post ? Is your issue resolved ?1] https://ninjastic.space/post/61566357

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: nikok on January 09, 2023, 08:04:01 AM You know dude, first of all, the member here in this forum is not a fortune teller. Second, why are you making a topic that you don't even give a situation based on the title you made?How can we resolve the issue of the title you made if you didn't say what kind of crypto address are you referring to dude? what is it, have you lost or forgotten what your password, private key, or seed phrases are? or what kind of software wallet are you talking about dude?
